abstract: Chicago White Sox chairman Jerry Reinsdorf defends team's front office in dispute with first baseman Adam LaRoche, who said he is retiring after being told to cut down his son's clubhouse access.
lead_paragraph: Jerry Reinsdorf, the chairman of the Chicago White Sox, said he had “complete faith” in his team’s front office in the aftermath of the Adam LaRoche dispute.

headline.main: White Sox Chairman Responds to Adam LaRoche Dispute

snippet: Jerry Reinsdorf, the chairman of the Chicago White Sox, said he had “complete faith” in his team’s front office in the aftermath of the Adam LaRoche dispute.
